name: Business Region Göteborg AB
memberOrga: We are the regional equivalent to a trade and industry development agency, wholly owned by a subsidiary to the City of Göteborg. We are non-profit.
goal:
Business Region Göteborg AB is dedicated to strengthening and developing trade and industry in the Göteborg region.
We are a non-profit organization representing 13 member municipalities. Our goal is to contribute to sustainable economic growth, a high level of employment and a diversified economy.
interests: Business and Industry, Culture, Digital economy and society, Energy, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
We follow H2020 and COSME very closely.
We are active members of Eurocities
